extensionDescription.message: Adds anchor links to the securitytrails.com subdomain results table that let you open the subdomain in a new tab, instead of opening the details for that domain in the SecurityTrails UI.

tableHeaderTitle.description: Text used in the header cell of the new column added to the domains table.

httpLinkText.description: Display text used for the http anchor link added to the domains table.

httpsLinkText.description: Display text used for the https anchor link added to the domains table.
